text: Guillermo Alejandro Páez Cepeda (born April 18, 1945 in Santiago, Chile) is a former Chilean footballer who played for 6 clubs of Chile and in the Chile national football team in the FIFA World Cup Germany 1974. ==Teams== * Universidad Católica 1962-1966 * San Antonio Unido 1966 * Lota Schwager 1967-1971 * Colo-Colo 1972-1979 * Deportes Aviación 1980 * Santiago Morning 1981-1982 * Santiago Wanderers 1983 ==Titles== * Universidad Católica 1966 (Chilean Championship) * Colo-Colo 1972 and 1979 (Chilean Championship) ==External links== * Profile at FIFA.com Profile at Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean football managers Category:Chile international footballers Category:Club Deportivo Universidad Católica footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Lota Schwager footballers Category:Santiago Morning footballers Category:Santiago Wanderers footballers Category:San Antonio Unido footballers Category:Deportes Aviación footballers Category:1974 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Guillermo Páez
